Key Arguments: The legislation exempts the government and its agencies from scrutiny, which is seen as immoral and a breach of rights.
The government is accused of being a major source of misinformation and disinformation.
The legislation is viewed as discriminatory against those with differing religious or political opinions.
The court system is perceived as biased and ineffective in providing justice against government actions.
Public health responses during the COVID-19 pandemic are cited as examples of government misinformation.
Main Themes: Criticism of public health measures during COVID-19
Notable Quotes: Government, Government Agencies and Departments and our political leaders are inherent liars.
We reject this legislation. We do not agree. We do not consent. We will not comply with such outrageous self serving 'laws'.
